roleset.name: to bind with or as if with cement
roleset.note: CEMENT-V NOTES: Frames file for 'cement' based on survey of sentences in the WSJ corpus. (from cement.01-v predicate notes)

example.name: gerund
example.text: [*] Cementing such relationships with major clients -- car and appliance makers -- is a means of survival , especially when those key clients are relying on a smaller pool of producers [*T*-1]and flirting with plastic and aluminum makers [*T*-1] .
example.arg: such relationships with major clients -- car and appliance makers --
